edu.cornell.georeference

Class DistanceScoreQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.search.Query
      • org.apache.lucene.search.function.CustomScoreQuery
        • edu.cornell.georeference.DistanceScoreQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class DistanceScoreQuery
extends org.apache.lucene.search.function.CustomScoreQuery
    This class is a child class of the CustomeScoreQuery. It allow the distance to affect the score.
    Author:
    Yang Yang Zheng

    • Constructor Detail

      • DistanceScoreQuery

        public DistanceScoreQuery(org.apache.lucene.search.Query subQuery,
                  org.apache.lucene.spatial.tier.DistanceQueryBuilder dq,
                  int scoreOption)
        Create a distance score query by providing the subquery, the distance query builder, and the score option
        Parameters:
        subQuery - the sub query that is to be wrapped around
        dq - the distance query builder that provides the distances
        scoreOption - controls how the distance affects the score

      • DistanceScoreQuery

        public DistanceScoreQuery(org.apache.lucene.search.Query subQuery,
                  org.apache.lucene.search.function.ValueSourceQuery valSrcQuery,
                  org.apache.lucene.spatial.tier.DistanceQueryBuilder dq,
                  int scoreOption)
        This is the constructor of the class
        Parameters:
        subQuery - the sub query that is to be wrapped around
        valSrcQuery - the query whose scores are used in the custom score computation
        dq - the distance query builder that provides the distances
        scoreOption - controls how the distance affects the score
